divs: Sighting DetailsIt flew in from the south east looking like a clear plastic bag blowing in the wind from a distance. As it got closer I could tell that it was shaped like a giant blood cell. Clear and nearly invisible with a dark center. It hovered above me and never made a noise. I wanted to get a camera but I was affraid it would fly away from me. Eventually it did fly off in a north east direction. As it flew off into the distance all I could see was the dark center of the ship. I don't know if it makes any differnce but I was praying to GOD for a sign right before I saw the object. The Bible describes numerous ufo's so I wander if God really did give me a sign.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Rainelle
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: from a distance it looked like a clear plastic bag but As it soon hovered above me it was cloaked making it nearly invisible but I could clearly see that it was a large cicle with a dark center. Shaped like a Giant blood cell.
